title: Fake Tweet Generator
description: A web app that generates realistic fake tweet images by customizing username, name, tweet text, like count, and retweet count.

title: Spend Money
description: Users spend a virtual budget on various items, simulating fun and educational money management app.

title: Sticky Notes
description: Users can click on the board to leave hidden or public comments, simulating real sticky notes in a digital way..

title: Regular Show Task Board
description: In the Regular Show Task Board ,Users can assign missions to characters from the show, manage tasks, and interact with a colorful digital board.

title: Code Editor
description: This is a simple Code Editor project where users can write HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and instantly see the output in real-time.

title: Personal Website
description: This is my personal website where I showcase my work, projects, and skills.

title: Pos Application
description: This project is a full-featured POS (Point of Sale) application where products can be added to the cart, purchased, and invoices can be viewed.
